{{DisambigMsg|the character in {{game|poe2}}|the [Fighter](/fighter/) / [Ranger](/ranger/) multiclass|Multiclass{{!}}Hunter (class)|the character [background](/background/)|Culture and background#Hunter{{!}}Hunter (background)}}
'''Hunter''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

An aumaua merchant in her stall "Hunting & Sundries", selling wares to people in need of supplies for hunting.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = Hunting supplies and the unique [Clay Grub Figurine](/clayGrubFigurine/).
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
}}
